comments_0.comment_text: Could you please try with BRANCH='main' in the first cell of the notebook.

comments_3.comment_text:
Could you please restart the kernel and run this one:
 BRANCH = 'main'
 !python -m pip install git+<denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/NeMo.git@$BRANCH#egg=nemo_toolkit%5Ball%5D>https://github.com/NVIDIA/NeMo.git@$BRANCH#egg=nemo_toolkit[all]</denchmark-link>
